低于该金额的订单将不会被计划开票。

value.original: Link Column
Link Column for Multi-Parent tables

row.value: 子表的外键列，将被链接到父列

value.original: The Link Column indicates which column is the primary key for those situations where there is more than one parent. Only define it, if the table has more than one parent column (e.g. AD_User_Roles).

row.value: 子表有多个父表时，指定子表的列来链接两表关系。比如“用户组织权限”，使用用户ID，组织ID这两个外键，当挂在用户父标签下，链接列设置为用户ID；当挂在组织父标签下，链接列设置为组织ID。

value.original: The Accounting Date indicates the date to be used on the General Ledger account entries generated from this document. It is also used for any currency conversion. value.original: Document No
Document sequence number of the document

row.value: 单据的序号，可自动生成或手动输入

value.original:
The document number is usually automatically generated by the system and determined by the document type of the document. If the document is not saved, the preliminary number is displayed in "<>".
If the document type of your document has no automatic document sequence defined, the field is empty if you create a new document. This is for documents which usually have an external number (like vendor invoice). If you leave the field empty, the system will generate a document number for you. The document sequence used for this fallback number is defined in the "Maintain Sequence" window with the name "DocumentNo_<TableName>", where TableName is the actual name of the table (e.g. C_Order).

row.value:
单号通常由系统自动生成，并由单据的类型所决定。如果单据未保存，则候选序号显示在“< >”中。不用编辑自动生成的序号，系统会自动获取当前值。如果保存提示单据序号重复，可运行“序号维护”。

如果单据的单据类型未定义自动生成单据序号，则本字段在创建新单据时为空。通常这用作具有外部编号的单据（如供应商发票）。如果将此字段空白保存，系统也会生成一个单号。其名称为“单据序号_<表名>”。

The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: 业务伙伴的联系人，可以使用名称和密码登录到系统。

如果选择，产品将一直在途，直到确认后完成的库存移动。

row.value: 系统引用 - 可选覆盖

Search key for the record in the format required

value.original: Item Name

value.original: Condition Value

Select the manufacturing resource (previously defined) where you want to execute the operation. For the product costing, the Resource rate is taken from the cost element introduced in the window Product Costing.

row.value: 在你想要执行的操作上选择(先前定义的）生产资源；对于产品成本，资源率从产品成本窗口中定义成本元素获得。

value.original: Business Partner
Identifies a Business Partner to Subcontrating
A Business Partner is anyone with whom you transact. This can include Vendor, Customer, Employee or Salesperson
Valid from
Valid from including this date (first day)

row.value: 有效起始日期， 包括当日 (第一天)

value.original: The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range. When you enter dates in the fields Valid From - To we give the the period of time where this operation will have to be considered for the elaboration of the product.

row.value: 起始日期表示有效日期范围的第一天 起始日期和终止日期表示在这段时间范围内该BOM可以在生产线中使用。

value.original: Valid to
Valid to including this date (last day)

row.value: 有效截止日期， 包括当日 (最后一天)

value.original: The Valid To date indicates the last day of a date range When you enter dates in the fields Valid From - To we give the the period of time where this operation will have to be considered for the elaboration of the product.

row.value: 起始日期表示有效日期范围的第一天， 当你在字段中输入日期 起始日期 - 终止日期，我们指定在该时间范围内合成产品。

value.original: Start Node
Workflow Node step or process

row.value: 工作流节点、步骤或流程

value.original: The Workflow Node indicates a unique step or process in a Workflow.

row.value: 工作流节点代表了工作流中的一个独特步骤或流程。

value.original: Copy BOM Lines From
Copy BOM Lines from an exising BOM

row.value: 将已有的BOM明细复制到目标BOM

value.original: Copy BOM Lines from an exising BOM. The BOM being copied to, must not have any existing BOM Lines.

row.value: 将已有的BOM明细复制到目标BOM，目标BOM不能有任何明细数据。

value.original: Valid from
Valid from including this date (first day)

row.value: 有效起始日期， 包括当日 (第一天)

value.original:
The Valid From date indicates the first day of a date range
The Valid From and Valid To dates indicate the valid time period to use the BOM in a Manufacturing Order.

row.value:
有效起始日期表示日期范围的第一天
The Valid From and Valid To dates indicate the valid time period to use the BOM in a Manufacturing Order。

value.original: Storage Warehouse and Service Point

The Warehouse identifies a unique Warehouse where products are stored or Services are provided.
Warehouse place where you locate and control the products

row.value:
仓库标识存储产品或提供服务的唯一仓库
仓库是你存放和控制产品的地方。

value.original: A manufacturing resource is a place where a product will be made.

row.value: 制造资源是一个生产产品的地方。

value.original: BOM & Formula

The name BOM/Formula that you introduce in this window will be considered the default BOM to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the default BOM & Formula for the entity will be the BOM/Formula which has the same name as the product.

row.value: 在该窗口中的BOM名称将被视为本组织（工厂、仓库）默认的BOM用来生产产品。如果你没有填写该字段，系统将根据产品的名称去获得默认的BOM。

value.original: Workflow or combination of tasks

The Workflow field identifies a unique Workflow in the system. The Workflow you introduce in this window will be considered the default Workflow to produce the product in this Organization-Plant-Warehouse. If you do not fill this field the defaul Workflow for the entity will be the Workflow with the same name as the product.

row.value:
工作流字段标识系统中唯一的工作流
在这个窗口中你输入工作流将被视为在这个组织（工厂/仓库）生产该产品的默认工作流。如果你未填写该字段，系统将具有相同产品名称的工作流设置为默认的工作流。

value.original: Promised Delivery Time
Promised days between order and delivery

row.value: 在订单与交付之间的承诺天数

value.original: The Promised Delivery Time indicates the number of days between the order date and the date that delivery was promised. You must enter the average number of days to receive the product in the warehouse since you approve the requisition or manufacturing order until you receive the material in the warehouse . If the product is bought you must register the calendar days required since you make the PO until you receive the material in the warehouse. If the product is manufactured in your plant you must register the number of working days since you release the MO until you receive the material in the warehouse.

row.value:
表示订单日期与承诺交付日期之间的天数。必须输入平均天数（从批准请购单或生产工单，直到仓库收到材料）。
如果需求产品是采购订单完成，从你生成采购订单到仓库收料的天数。
如果需求产品是生产工单完成，从你生成生产工单到产品入库的天数。

value.original: Working Time
Workflow Simulation Execution Time

Amount of time the performer of the activity needs to perform the task in Duration Unit
In the field Working Time you enter the accumulated time (using the Promising Delivery Time) in the critical path of the BOM for this product. It is the required time to produce the product as if you would not have any component on hand.

row.value:
活动执行者的时间值，即执行任务所需的时长 (以持续时间单位计)。
在工作时间字段里输入该产品用于物料清单关键路径上的累计时间（用承诺交付时间计算）。这是生产该产品所必需花的时间，就好像你没有任何配件一切从头开始一样。

value.original: System Notice acknowledged

row.value: 表示通知已经知晓，选择后该通知将隐藏

value.original: The Acknowledged checkbox indicates if this notice does not need to be retained.

row.value: 表示通知已经知晓，选择后该通知将隐藏

value.original: Accumulated Qty
Total Quantity

Sum of the quantities
This field shows the sum of the quantities of the product that have had movements.

row.value: 移库数量表示产品已被移动的数量。

value.original: Accumulated Amt
Total Amount

Sum of all amounts
This field shows the sum of the amounts of the product that have had movements.

row.value: 产品移动的的累计金额

value.original: Ordered Quantity
Ordered Quantity
The Ordered Quantity indicates the quantity of a product that was ordered.
Instance To
Target Product Attribute Set Instance

row.value: 目标产品的属性集实例

value.original: User within the system - Internal or Business Partner Contact
The User identifies a unique user in the system. This could be an internal user or a business partner contact

row.value: 业务伙伴的联系人，可以使用名称和密码登录到系统。

value.original: Date Ordered
Date of Order

Indicates the Date an item was ordered. Date Ordered is the date when the order was generated. If the MO is created manually the default date ordered is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP the default date ordered is the day of the MRP process.

row.value: 如果是手动创建的MO则下单日期是系统日期。如果MO是由MRP生成，那么默认下单日期则产生于MRP流程。

value.original: Date Promised
Date Order was promised

The Date Promised indicates the date, if any, that an Order was promised for. Date Promised Is the date we commit to give the order to the warehouse. If the MO is created manually the default date promised is the system date. If the MO was generated by MRP this date is filled automatically using its algorithm calculation.

row.value: 订单承诺交付的日期，承诺日期是承诺订单到仓库的日期，如果生产单是手动创建的，承诺日期默认为系统日期；如果生产单是的MRP生产的，承诺日期由MRP算法计算所得。

value.original: Date Start
Indicate the real date to start
It is the date when the first manufacturing order movement is reported, this movement can be an inventory or labor movement.

row.value: 第一个生产订单的人力或者库存开始动作日期。

value.original: Finish Date
Finish or (planned) completion date

row.value: 订单完成（或计划完成）日期

value.original:
The finish date is used to indicate when the project is expected to be completed or has been completed.
To Manufacturing Order is the date when the last manufacturing order movement is reported, It is the closing order date.

row.value: 对于销售订单，该日期是期望完成或者已经完成日期；对于生产订单，该日期是最后一个人力或者库存动作完成日期。

row.value: 数据的关联类型，当前只有隐式

value.original: For now we only have implicit realtion types, i.e. the record pairs are defined by the rule itself. In future we would like to have explicit type also. An explizit type just defines a template, the actual pairs can be added by a user or by the system itself.

value.original: Sql FROM
SQL FROM clause
The Select Clause indicates the SQL FROM clause to use for selecting the record for a measure calculation. It can have JOIN clauses. It must include the FROM itself.
